tool_description: Evaluates and scores the confidence levels of classification results from multiple analysis tools, helping identify uncertain or ambiguous classifications.

classification_results.description: Array of classification results to evaluate

confidence_values.description: Array of confidence values from classification tools

classification_types.description: Array of classification type labels (topic, product, service, issue)

aggregation_method.description: Method for aggregating multiple confidence scores: simple_average, weighted_average, or minimum

error_messages: Mismatched array lengths: classification_results, confidence_values, and classification_types must have the same length.
Invalid confidence values: All confidence values must be between 0 and 1.
Unsupported aggregation method: Use simple_average, weighted_average, or minimum.
Empty classification data: Provide at least one classification result to score.
usage: Provide arrays of classification_results, confidence_values, and classification_types from other tools. Choose aggregation_method for combining scores. Returns overall confidence assessment.

overall_confidence.description: Aggregated confidence score across all classifications

confidence_breakdown.description: Individual confidence scores for each classification type

low_confidence_flags.description: Flags indicating classifications with low confidence

reliability_score.description: Overall reliability assessment: high, medium, or low
